income_messages:
From: i***********************d@zohomail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-19 20:12:31
SUBJECT:   Hello,
  Hello,
We hereby inform you that the International Monetary Fund {IMF} and
{UN} are paying compensation to all victims of fraud in the amount of
350,000 US dollars, which was also signed by the Office of the
President, your names and email address have been transferred to the
United States. declares the secret service of one of the arrested
swindlers.
Meanwhile, the IMF and the United Nations commissioned this
compensation department to transfer your compensation funds to you
through online payments, which is a 100% guarantee of payment to you
as one of the fraud victims.
In addition, we advise you to stop all further communication with the
office of any other person(s) regarding any transaction that could
cause you to lose your hard-earned money, in order to avoid losing
money to another group of scammers who are wanted by the FBI and all
are still being sought. run, and for this reason, we want to warn you
not to report or duplicate this message to anyone for any reason, as
the United States Secret Service is already on the trail of other
criminals.
Anticipating your urgent cooperation in others to receive your payment.
Thank you
Mr Kenji Okamura
Deputy Managing Director (IMF)
internationalnonetaryfund@zohomail.com
From: i***********************d@zohomail.com
To: ty70027@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-20 21:27:48
SUBJECT: Re:   Hello,
We confirm receipt of your email. We at the IMF office, in collaboration with the UNITED NATIONS (UN), are working together to make sure your funds are transferred to your online account as requested. We give you a 100% guarantee on the process of your funds if you follow the Rules and Regulations of our Department, we have signed all the necessary documentation and you will not be asked for any fees for any reason, we have a connection with the legal department of the IMF. 
Your documentation will be forwarded by a lawyer to the payout bank to your online account, in which the amount of $350 (three hundred and fifty US dollars) will be the requested fee that you will pay for your online activation, this payment is not directed to any department, their the payment is sent to your online account, which you can also withdraw from your account instantly once the activation is done.
Confirm the payment and we will proceed with the activation.
Submit the details below for re-confirmation so we can proceed with work as soon as possible.
(A) Full name
(B) MOBILE Phone number:
(c) proof of address:
(D) Copy of passport or any government-issued ID.
Thank you
Mr. Kenji Okamura
Deputy Managing Director (IMF)
international mailto:non-netarifund@zohomail.com
From: i***********************d@zohomail.com
To: ty70027@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-21 11:51:08
SUBJECT: Deputy Managing Director (IMF)
We hereby inform you that the International Monetary Fund {IMF} and {UN} are paying compensation to all victims of fraud in the amount of 350,000 US dollars, which was also signed by the Office of the President. We do our best to make sure your funds have been credited to your designated account as below, there was a meeting yesterday (T.O.U.M.F) which was held in Washington, they gave all instructions to make sure all funds were paid before, 5th. next month in which we need your full cooperation so that your payment can be transferred to your online account. 
Note: Before we can proceed, we will need to verify the payment with a lawyer before proceeding with opening an online account in your name. As soon as the account is opened, the paying bank will send you an SMS with the username. and account password. Once this is done, a deposit of $350 (three hundred and fifty US dollars) will be automatically reflected in the account as indicated below.
Pay the requested fees before we can get to work with the lawyer and your payment.
Looking forward to your urgent cooperation with others to get your payment.
Thank you
Mr. Kenji Okamura
Deputy Managing Director (IMF)
International Monetary Fund
From: i***********************d@zohomail.com
To: ty70027@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-21 15:09:58
SUBJECT: Deputy Managing Director (IMF)
We hereby inform you that the International Monetary Fund {IMF} and {UN} are paying compensation to all victims of fraud in the amount of 350,000 US dollars, which was also signed by the Office of the President. From the Record and Report and Report We received from the Government office is to pay off the Compensation Funds, Via the Online Account to Avoid Any problem, and to send a Confirmation Report to Their office, Note that your not Paying the Lawyer, the payment that was Requested is on your own Benefit, Via the Amount that will be Deposited into your online Account, the Amount Requested to pay is to activate your Account before Transferring the said Amount 350,000 US dollars.
They payment Requested will be Used to Activate your Account Which you can also Withdraw As soon as it's been Activated, As soon as the Payment is Confirms the Funds will be Credited into your Online and you can transfer from your online account to any bank in the world.
Looking forward to your urgent cooperation with others to get your payment.
Thank you
Mr. Kenji Okamura
Deputy Managing Director (IMF)
International Monetary Fund
outbound_messages:
From: ty70027@l******s.email
To: i***********************d@zohomail.com
Time: 2023-04-19 20:12:38
SUBJECT: Re:   Hello,
Hello Mr. Kenji Okamura,
Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the payment of fraud victims by the Monetary Fund IMF and UN. I appreciate the information you have provided and would like to know more about the online payment process. Can you please provide me with more details on how to receive the payment and what steps I need to take to ensure a smooth transfer?
Also, I understand the importance of avoiding any further contact with other offices or individuals regarding this matter. Can you please advise me on how to proceed if I receive any such requests in the future?
Thank you for your assistance.
Best wishes,
Richard
From: ty70027@l******s.email
To: i***********************d@zohomail.com
Time: 2023-04-20 22:24:52
SUBJECT: Re:   Hello,
Thank you for your email. I appreciate the update on my funds. Can you please provide more information on why a fee of $350 is required for the activation of my online account? Also, can you confirm the name of the payout bank that my funds will be forwarded to? I would like to ensure that everything is legitimate before proceeding with any payments. 
My full name is , my mobile phone number is , and my proof of address is . I will provide a copy of my passport once I receive more information from you.
Best wishes,
Richard
From: ty70027@l******s.email
To: i***********************d@zohomail.com
Time: 2023-04-21 16:13:09
SUBJECT: Re: Deputy Managing Director (IMF)
Hello Mr. Kenji Okamura,
Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the payment from the Monetary Fund IMF and UN. I appreciate the information you have provided. Can you please provide me with more details about the payment process and how I can ensure that my account is activated? Also, can you please confirm the authenticity of this offer and provide me with any official documents or links that I can refer to?
Thank you for your time and assistance.
Best wishes,
Richard
